New Records: Unbroken 72-run ninth-wicket partnership set a record for a game involving a full ICC member
Key Match Events: West Indies needed 27 runs to equal Englandâ€™s tally of 171 for 8 in the final over
Akeal Hosein contributed 26 runs with three 6s and two 4s in the final over
Romario Shepherd hit 23 runs including five sixes in the final over
Saqib Mahmood allowed two wides in the final over which helped West Indies
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Kieron Pollard won the toss and elected to field
England captain Eoin Morgan emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies captain Kieron Pollard praised the fight at the back end of the innings
England captain Eoin Morgan was pleased with the team's performance despite the narrow win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
Joel Wilson, the umpire, allowed Saqib Mahmood significant latitude in the final over
